pullrequest.title: New user interaction method and resize functionality

content.raw: One more issue for you to look at. Insert a mesh (I used the cube_20k model). Select the model for translation. Then use View->Transparent. At this point I can translate along the z-axis, but I can't select the x or y arrows (the portions of the arrow that are in the cube).
content.html: One more issue for you to look at. Insert a mesh (I used the cube_20k model). Select the model for translation. Then use View->Transparent. At this point I can translate along the z-axis, but I can't select the x or y arrows (the portions of the arrow that are in the cube).
